articles.title: July consumer prices jump 5.4%, but core inflation rises less than expected - CNBC
articles.description: Prices that Americans pay for everyday goods and services accelerated in July, but about where economists had expected.
articles.content:
Prices that Americans pay for everyday goods and services accelerated in July as pent-up demand for travel and restaurants kept inflation hot, but about where economists had expected.

articles.title: New Lineage of Carnivorous Plants Discovered | Biology - Sci-News.com
articles.description: The newly-identified lineage of carnivorous plants is represented by the western false asphodel (Triantha occidentalis), a species of flowering plant from North America.

articles.title: Two more cities fall to the Taliban as thousands flee northern Afghanistan - SBS News
articles.description: The Taliban has now seized eight provincial capitals in a five-day blitz, but US President Joe Biden has given no hint of delaying his deadline to withdraw all American troops.
articles.content: The Taliban seized two more Afghan cities on Tuesday - including one just 200 kilometres from Kabul - as tens of thousands of people fled their homes in the north for the relative safety of the capit… [+4080 chars]

articles.author: Allison Bray
articles.title: New York's new Governor Kathy Hochul has strong Irish roots - Independent.ie
articles.description: New York’s new Governor Kathy Hochul is set to make history as the first ever female Governor of New York and the second Irish American to hold the post following the resignation today of Andrew Cuomo following a string of sexual misconduct allegations.
